TopicTitle: In Game Bug reporting system similar to Subnautica

Articles.Content: Subnautica has an amazing bug reporting feature that basically takes a screenshot of the game allows the user to rate what's happening with a happy face or sad face and write a quick comment. I believe it even sends a log behind the scenes for the team to debug. I think this would really improve the feedback you guys get without users needing to post on the forums. Exmaple
KSP has the same thing in the launcher.
if you use the launcher. The standalone PD version of the game doesn't even come with that, which is normally fine by me but for bug reports it removes that option.

It's possible that we add a feature like this eventually, yes. We're locking down our internal bug report workflows and once we feel like it's useful and efficient, we can begin to examine how we can make it easier for all of you to send in reports as well.
